title: BTS is Back: The Boy Band Returns
summary: BTS is a famous boy band from South Korea. They took a break for four years so all seven members could do their military service. Now, they are coming back with a new album and a big world tour. Fans called Army are very excited. One fan named Ashia loves BTS and wants to see them in concert in the UK. She saw them last in 2018. BTS played at Wembley Stadium in 2019, which was a big event. Their last tour was in 2021-2022. The new tour will be even bigger. Fans have waited a long time to see BTS live again.

background_read: BTS is a K-pop boy band from South Korea that started in 2013. They became very popular worldwide with songs about self-love and mental health. In South Korea, all men must serve in the military for about two years. BTS took a break so each member could do this duty. Fans, known as Army, support them strongly. Concerts are big events where fans sing and dance along. The band's return is exciting for many people who enjoy their music.
Article_Structure: WHO: BTS, a boy band from South Korea, and their fans called Army
WHAT: BTS is returning from a hiatus with a new album and world tour
WHERE: They plan to tour worldwide, including the UK where they played at Wembley Stadium
WHY: They took a break for military service, and now fans are excited to see them live again

perspectives.description: Fans like Ashia are very happy and eager to see BTS perform again after a long wait.
